TranRunJLite
Class SISOFeedback

java.lang.Object
  TranRunJLite.TrjTask
      TranRunJLite.SISOFeedback
Direct Known Subclasses:
HysteresisControl, PIDControl
public abstract class SISOFeedback
extends TrjTask

Base class for single-input, single-output feedback control. This class has all of the basic stuff except for the actual algorithm.

Author:
D.M.Auslander, July 13, 2009

Constructor Detail

SISOFeedback

public SISOFeedback(java.lang.String name,
                    TrjSys sys,
                    double dt,
                    double mMin,
                    double mMax,
                    double mOff,
                    boolean triggerMode,
                    int initialState,
                    boolean taskActive)
Constuctor for the single-input, single output feedback control base class. It must be extended with a class containing and algorithm and then extended by the user so that input and output can be determined.

Parameters:
name - Task name
sys - TrjSys in which this task is embedded
dt - Controller interval
mMin - Minimum allowed actuation value
mMax - Maximum ...
mOff - Actuation value to use when the controller is off
triggerMode - 'true' if controller only runs directly after some other task task runs (usually that is a Supervisory task)
initialState - State that is entered when controller becomes active
taskActive - 'true' for state to be active
